description:
Craig is a college student from the midwest. As I mention in the video, I think he has a very sexy Brazilian look to him, but he actually isn't Latin at all.
He works as a waiter and one of his gay patrons persuaded him to send his pictures to us. I'm glad he did because Craig is one of those super-sweet models who is an absolute pleasure to work with. He has a fun personality and I got a kick out of him telling me about the three girls he's juggling back home.
He'd never seen the ocean so we decided to take him down and do some shooting there. Unfortunately, I wore the wrong shoes (you'd think I would have this down by now) and slipped and fell on my ass not once but twice! It was worth it though, because he's such a pretty boy and he looked so nice against the blue water!
title: Craig
